descriptions.overview: Southwire's tempered spring steel fish tapes provide excellent fishing performance, with a rugged case that is impact resistant and job site tough.
list: Reaches easily above ceilings, under carpets, and through walls to install wire
High impact, durable case and handle for long lasting performance and use
To pay out the fish tape, pull on the actual fish tape itself (gloves are recommended) reel back in by rotating the case in reverse while holding the handle
Laser etched footage markings to help identify length of pull
Special treated, high quality blued steel for longer life and easier pulling

reviews.title: "Simple to use and effective"
reviews.text: Bought through inline pick up was ready within 1hr. Product is sturdy and worked like a champ when using it to fish a home network wire. At first it feels awkward to use but you'll get used it (the round handle part that is.)
reviews.author: Dfuse

reviews.title: "Cheaply Made"
reviews.text: Purchased this to fish tape to pull a wire through about 50ft of conduit. Worked great for about 25ft but then the steel wire stared escaping out of the reel itself. The plastic housing will easily come apart allowing the steel tape to escape all around the handle. I would not recommend. Wasted $40 on this
reviews.author: Don

reviews.title: "Solid product"
reviews.text: Having seen and used poor quality fish wire reels, I was impressed with how smoothly the fish wire fed in and out of the reel. No jamming. Good weight on a ladder, easy to handle.
reviews.author: RevJ

reviews.title: "Good product.  Metal is a bit flimsy, but it works"
reviews.text: This has helped me with a couple projects so far, particularly running telephone and electrical wire in my home for new outlets/plugs.  It works well, doesn't kink, and stays well coiled.  The end is bent a bit to help grab and retrieve, but I have found that the metal is a bit thin and flimsy.  The bent end unbends a bit too easily and straightens out with what I would consider a normal degree of pull.  It also gets stuck a little too easily.  However, it does do the job, especially for the price paid.
reviews.author: Sean

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: Good quality at a good price.  I already owned a couple of these and unfortunately 1 was misplaced.  This time I decided to buy 2 so that I'd have an extra on hand and with 2 of them the shipping was free.
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Works like you would expect it to"
reviews.text: For being the cheapest option at Lowe's, it really works well. I recommend, it has a laser etched measuring marks on it.
reviews.author: L

reviews.title: "Pulling cable"
reviews.text: A small steel rod to push through then pull cable back to you works as advertised.
reviews.author: AlF

reviews.title: "Great product!"
reviews.text: Helped a great deal moving electrical wires through my wall and was super easy!
reviews.author: BLAKE

reviews.title: "Fish tape"
reviews.text: Worked great needed 200 feet is saved a lot of work
reviews.author: Herb
